message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to part with it for $800000. I think this is a fair price considering its value to you.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice, but I think $800000 is a bit steep. I'm willing to pay $700000 for it. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I was hoping we could meet in the middle. I'm willing to compromise and sell the product to you for $750000. I think this is a fair price considering its value to both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $750000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $725000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I understand your concerns, but I'm still holding out for a better price. I'm willing to make one more concession and sell the product to you for $735000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, considering the value it holds for you.

I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make a final offer of $725000. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me, and I'm willing to walk away if you're not willing to meet me here.
